title: Legendcraft (My Concept Moba)
body:
After some thought I have decided to go ahead and put the bulk of my concept here on the forums.

I am very passionate about it, and the dream is to someday find a team of programmers, and create this EPIC game.

If someone steals my concept, and makes the game without me..... fuck it.

That is a risk I'm willing to take.

So here it is folks.

A rundown of my concept so far.

{{sticker:fiora-cool}}
